alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow will impact portions of southeastern Liberty, southern Hill and northern Chouteau Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow along a line extending from 7 miles east of The Knees to 30 miles south of Chester to 14 miles north of Fort Benton to 16 miles south of Big Sandy. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chester, Big Sandy, Inverness, Gildford, Joplin, Boneau, Box Elder, Azure, Sangrey, St. Pierre, Hingham, Rudyard, Tiber Dam, Laredo, Loma, Kenilworth and Virgelle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Western and Central Chouteau County
